info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:22PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...STRONGER WIND GUSTS, UPWARDS OF 55 MPH, THIS EVENING... Numerous high based showers, with some embedded thunder, have developed along the Continental Divide this afternoon producing areas of strong, sub-severe, wind gusts. Expectation is for continued activity across the San Luis Valley, mid-Arkansas River Valley and portions of the Front Range through the evening hours. Wind gusts may exceed 50-55 MPH with these showers.
